name: Jet Strike Mission
overview: Your goals are to successfully take-off a Jet fighter-Bomber from Base before being destroyed on the runway by an enemy attack. Climb to a suitable altitude and fly at cruising speed, on the correct bearing to the specified target. To avoid aerial attack and destruction, continuous evasive action needs to be employed. ON reaching the target it has to be destroyed, in several passes if necessary. After eliminating the target or expending the payload without success, return to Base has to be accomplished through a network of attacks, and a safe landing made at a correct speed and heading.
